title: Set alias for columns in dataset, but expression builder shows old column names
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, it still shows the old column names instead of the aliases.
SR: Description: Set aliases for columns in a dataset, but expression builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a new data source and dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset in the drop-down menu.
